Job Title: Business Analyst

Location: Whippany, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Business Development, General Business

Description:
Inclusively is partnering with a multinational universal bank to hire a Lead Reference Data Business Analyst. **Please note: this role is NOT an internal position with Inclusively but with the partner company.**
ABOUT INCLUSIVELY:Inclusively is a digital tech platform that connects candidates with disabilities, who may benefit from workplace accommodations, to inclusive employers. This includes all disabilities under the ADA, including mental health conditions (e.g. anxiety, depression, PTSD), chronic illnesses (e.g. diabetes, Long COVID), and neurodivergence (e.g. autism, ADHD). Applicants with one or more of these conditions are encouraged to apply; Inclusively does not require applicants to disclose their specific disability.
As a Lead Reference Data Business Analyst, you will lead the development of Stargate Program using the Subject Matter Expertise of the Goldensource, Instrument and Pricing Reference Data Knowledge and Software Engineering skills. This is a techno-functional role where you is expected to be involved in all stages of software development, focusing on requirement Gathering, data analysis as well as troubleshooting, investigation and root-cause analysis of production support issues. 
At our company, we offer a hybrid working experience that blends the positives of working alongside colleagues at our onsite locations, together with working from home. We have a structured approach where colleagues work at an onsite location on fixed, ‘anchor’, days of the week, for a minimum of two days a week or more, as set by the business area (or nearest equivalent if working part-time hours). Please note that as we continue to embed our hybrid working environment, we remain in a test and learn phase, which means that working arrangements may be subject to change on reasonable notice to ensure we meet the needs of our business.
What will you be doing?Managing Stargate Technology Team to build and Deliver the Stargate Reference and Pricing Data PlatformImplementing proper SDLC and Development Control to the entire global team delivering Stargate PlatformCollaborating with Consumer Adoptions Stream, Data Remediation Team, Distribution Team to build the platform in eternityOwning the Definition of Done, JIRA Platforms and reporting for the Stargate Program DevelopmentWorking within a globally distributed teams to deliver business features for global sales and trading platformWorking together with Stargate Project and Program managers to plan, provide proper visibility and status on each of the deliverablesWorking with Operations and Production Support to provide solutions, tools and technique to reduce manual effortsImplementing UAT/Production handover procedures to deliver software monthly or bi-weekly into production
What we’re looking for:In depth and extensive understanding of building Instrument and Pricing Reference Data Platforms in Large Financial Services businessIn depth and extensive knowledge and experience in building with Goldensource TechnologyExperience in working in Large Sell Side or Buy Side Organizations as Team Lead for delivering Instrument and Pricing Reference Data Broad knowledge and understanding of various Instrument Asset Classes like Fixed Income, Equity, Funds and Derivatives
Skills that will help you in the role:Understanding of Big Data and Machine learning conceptsCertified AWS Professional or Google Cloud ProfessionalAbility to data analysis and create business requirements as neededNaturally curious and attracted to complicated problems

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
